duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate raw materials purchasing, production scheduling, and shipping to ensure smooth production flow.
Plan daily work schedules for hourly personnel in accordance with production plans and customer needs.
Obtain the best prices and service from legal carriers and determine effective shipping routes.
Prepare bills of materials from prints or drawings and prepare basic shop sketches for nonstandard fittings.
Maintain material inventory levels within pre-established objectives and prepare various inventory reports.
Resolve daily problems with regard to material rejections and production changes due to equipment breakdowns.
Ensure that company policies are communicated to production employees and employ practices consistent with these policies.
